featured.text: Under the _____ of newly elected president Barack Obama, the US is expected to turn a new page in politics and economy.

definition.zh_def: 美國第44任總統，任期從2009年至2017年，首位非裔美國人總統。
definition.en_def: The 44th President of the United States, serving from 2009 to 2017, and the first African American president.
definition.example: Barack Obama was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 2009.
